Title: I Caddyshacked the Pool
Writer: Adam F. Goldberg (created by), Stephen Basilone, Annie Mebane
Actors: Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, Troy Gentile, Hayley Orrantia
Plot: Adam forms a plan to avoid swimming at school -- even though a friendship could be affected; Barry joins a school club formed by Erica.
